packLanguageSlot(bytes2,uint8).notice: Pack a single (language, proficiency) into a 32-bit slot value

packLanguages(bytes2[8],uint8[8]).notice: Pack up to 8 (language, proficiency) pairs into a uint256

unpackLanguageSlot(uint32).notice: Unpack a 32-bit slot value into (language, proficiency)

unpackLanguages(uint256).notice: Unpack a uint256 into arrays of (language, proficiency)

upsertProfileFor(address,(uint8,string,b.notice: Sponsored profile update  anyone can submit on behalf of `user` if they provide the user's EIP-191 signature over the profile data. Message format:   heaven:profile:{user}:{profileHash}:{nonce} where profileHash = keccak256(abi.encode(in_))
